Steps.Message: Update at 17:52 - Hi, its Will again from the messaging team. Our engineers have been in touch to advise the ground they're having to dig through is tougher than expected and is slowing their progress. They are still continuing but due to this we have had to make another change to the estimated time frame. We're now estimating to have the power back on between 21:30 and 22:30. We're very sorry for this and for how frustrating this must be for you. Our team are here if you have any concerns. Just call us free on 105 or you can speak to us via Facebook and Twitter at @ukpowernetworks. Our engineers will work as quickly as they can to restore supplies and I will continue to keep you updated with any further news we receive.

We became aware of a power cut at 10:27. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Our engineers have been in touch to advise the ground they're having to dig through is tougher than expected and is slowing their progress. They are still continuing but due to this we have had to make another change to the estimated time frame. We're now estimating to have the power back on between 21:30 and 22:30. We're very sorry for this and for how frustrating this must be for you. Our team are here if you have any concerns. Just call us free on 105 or you can speak to us via Facebook and Twitter at @ukpowernetworks. Our engineers will work as quickly as they can to restore supplies and I will continue to keep you updated with any further news we receive.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
